name: Lionel Messi
description: Argentinian forward known for his dribbling, playmaking, and goal-scoring abilities. He has won multiple Ballon d'Or awards.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
description: Portuguese forward renowned for his athleticism and versatility. He is one of the top goal-scorers in football history.

name: Neymar Jr.
description: Brazilian forward known for his flair and creativity on the ball. He is a key player for both club and country.

name: Kylian Mbappe
description: French forward recognized for his speed and technical skill. He is a World Cup winner with France.

name: Kevin De Bruyne
description: Belgian midfielder known for his passing and vision. He is a crucial playmaker for Manchester City.

name: Mohamed Salah
description: Egyptian forward known for his pace and goal-scoring ability. He is a key player for Liverpool.

name: Robert Lewandowski
description: Polish striker known for his finishing and positioning. He is one of the most consistent goal-scorers in Europe.

name: Virgil van Dijk
description: Dutch defender known for his leadership and aerial ability. He is a key figure in Liverpool's defense.

name: Sadio Mane
description: Senegalese forward known for his speed and work rate. He has been crucial for both Liverpool and Bayern Munich.

name: Luka Modric
description: Croatian midfielder known for his passing and control. He won the Ballon d'Or in 2018.

name: Erling Haaland
description: Norwegian striker known for his physicality and goal-scoring prowess. He is a key player for Manchester City.

name: Karim Benzema
description: French forward known for his technical skills and goal-scoring. He has been a key player for Real Madrid.
